name: Princess and the Pea Embroidery Panel
description:
For your Stitching pleasure I now have the Princess and the Pea pattern printed on a fabric panel. The panel measures about 8 by 11.5 inch, the design is about 4.5 by 8.25 inch. The fabric is quality white Kona cotton. The lines of the design are thin (so easy to cover with your stitching) printed in a medium grey colour.

Note that this is the Embroidery Panel only. The PDF pattern which includes an extensive stitch and colour for the embroidery you see in the third photo is separately available in my shop. It's also available as a PDF + Panel set. Floss, needle and scissors are not included.

To make sure the princess arrives at your house safely and in style the panel is carefully (and lovingly I might add!) wrapped in tissue paper and send in a quality plastic envelope. 

The panel will be shipped to you within 3-5 working days. The panel will be shipped to the address you have registered with Paypal. If you want it shipped to another address please let me know in 'notes to seller'.

name: Most Excellent Party Bear
description:
Most Excellent Party Bear is a fun and versatile PDF pattern. You can either stitch it exactly like the, rather adorable, example (a colour and stitch key and embroidery tips are included!) or adapt it by altering the balloon designs to add initials of newly weds or baby names for example.

The pattern measures about 5.75 high by 4 inches wide.

This pattern will be available as a download after your purchase. You will receive an email containing a link to the pattern you have purchased. 
Any questions, please contact me, I'm happy to help.

For buyers from the E.U. I'm obliged to charge 21% VAT

name: Princess and the Pea Panel & PDF
description:
For your Stitching pleasure I now have the Princess and the Pea pattern printed on a fabric panel (See the second image, floss & scissors & needle are not included)  The panel measures about 8 by 11.5 inch, the design is about 4.5 by 8.25 inch. The fabric is quality white Kona cotton. The lines of the design are thin (so easy to cover with your stitching) printed in a medium grey colour. 

The PDF pattern, which includes an extensive stitch and colour key as well as the pattern*, is immediately available for download after payment is confirmed so you can gather your supplies before the panel arrives! 

The panel will be shipped to you within 3-5 working days. The panel will be shipped to the address you have registered with Paypal. If you want it shipped to another address please let me know in 'notes to seller'. 

*Please note that the printed image on the panel is slightly smaller than the design in the original pattern!

name: Abel the Stitch Explorer Sampler Pattern
description:
This adorable Stitch Exploring Mouse is called Abel (after a famous Dutch explorer) and has a sampler hiding on his Balloon! A perfect pattern to try out or learn new stitches and suitable for all skill levels.

The finished size of this pattern is about 9.5 by 9.5 inch.

This 9 page pattern has an extensive stitch and colour guide and advice on how to transfer the pattern. 

This pattern will be available as a download after your purchase. You will receive an email containing a link to the pattern you have purchased. You can then download the pattern (for personal use only) up till three times.

name: Princess and the Pea Sampler
description:
A beautiful and unique embroidery pattern of the popular Princess and the Pea fairy tale. This Original pattern is ideal to try new stitches (and use old favourites as well)!

This PDF pattern is 7 pages and includes details on colours and stitches used in the example embroidery. Finished size is about 8 by 4.5 inches.

Note that this is hand embroidery pattern, NOT a cross stitch pattern! I also have this design available in my shop as a ready-to-stitch Embroidery Panel (instructions not included).

This pattern will be available as a download after your purchase. You will receive an email containing a link to the pattern you have purchased.

Any questions, please contact me, I'm happy to help.

name: Fly me to the moon
description:
This Fly me to the moon pattern does not only feature a charming dancing Polar Bear named Fred but also some neat 'Fly me to the moon' lettering for your stitching pleasure! Fred is about 4" high. 

'Fly me to the moon'  includes a stitch and colour guide of stitches and colours used in the example embroideries as well as some useful tips on how to stitch a lively looking Polar Bear fur. 

This pattern will be available as a download after your purchase. You will receive an email containing a link to the pattern you have purchased. 
Any questions, please contact me, I'm happy to help.

For buyers from the E.U. I'm obliged to charge 21% VAT

name: Blossom Tree Nursery Embroidery and Wall Hanging pattern
description:
This Blossom Tree PDF Pattern is such a sweet way to welcome a newborn and makes a great addition to any nursery! Add baby's name and date of birth to create a very personal gift (a sheet with an Alphabet and numbers is included!) Note that for longer names you will need to make the font smaller or use another font. 

The 10 page pattern also includes a stitch and colour key for the embroidery and instructions on how to make simple quilted wall hanging. With the colours described in the pattern the embroidery will mainly suit a baby girl's nursery. For a 'boys' version simply use greens and blues (Apple Blossom!) instead of shades of pink and orange. The embroidery measures about 8.5" high by a little under 6.5" wide. The wall hanging measures 15 by 13".  

This pattern will be available as a download after your purchase. You will receive an email containing a link to the pattern you have purchased. 
Any questions, please contact me, I'm happy to help.

For buyers from the E.U. I'm obliged to charge 21% VAT

name: My Favourite Blanket
description:
How cute is this little fox, all snuggly beneath his favourite blanket? 'My Favourite blanket' is a versatile pattern. Besides the Union Jack version of the pattern as shown in the example embroidery you also receive a version with the American flag and a 'Folksy' blanket design (see second picture, the actual pattern will be clear and with black lines) You will find a full stitch and colour guide for the Union Jack version of the pattern and stitch suggestions for the American and Folksy blanket.

The finished embroidery is about 4 by 3.5" 

This pattern will be available as a download after your purchase. You will receive an email containing a link to the pattern you have purchased.
Any questions, please contact me, I'm happy to help.

For buyers from the E.U. I'm obliged to charge 21% VAT

name: Sailing Polar Bear
description:
This Sailing Polar Bear Hand Embroidery PDF Pattern is perfect for all kinds of projects. It will be great as wall art in nautical themed kids rooms, as center piece of a cushion or quilt block or stitched on a pillowcase.  

The 6 page pattern includes (besides front and intro): a 2 page colour and stitch guide and 2 versions of the pattern. One regular version and a 'mirrored' or 'reversed' version for easy transferring in the way you prefer. Finished size is about 6 by 6 inches.  The lettering reads: & on a windy day, he sailed away

This pattern will be available as a download after your purchase. You will receive an email containing a link to the pattern you have purchased.

Any questions, please contact me, I'm happy to help.

name: Tales of the Forest Motifs
description:
A delightful collection of 3 medium sized and 3 small motifs. In this hand embroidery pattern you will find a rather chic silhouette of a bear, a dainty doe and a bird who is also a key-keeper. For more stitching pleasure some tiny motifs of a flower, stars and a letter are added as well. 

These motifs are perfect for pillowcases, bags, tea towels and wall art.

The pattern also has a stitch and colour guide for the Bear, Doe and Bird pattern and tips on how to transfer your printed pattern to fabric.

After your purchase you will receive an e-mail with a link so you can download the pattern! Print the pattern, transfer and you will have hours of embroidery fun. 

Any questions, please let me know, I'm happy to help.

name: Forty Winks Fox incl guide on stitching fur
description:
Forty Winks Fox is a wonderful hand embroidery pattern featuring a snoozy fox in foliage. A versatile pattern which will look good as wall art or on a cushion. Or even as unique addition to a bag or a piece of clothing!

Finished size is about 4.5 by 5.5 inches.
This 10 page PDF pattern contains:
- the original pattern and a reversed version of the pattern for easy transferring.
- details on colours, strands and stitches used in the example embroidery
- details on how to pick the right floss colours for your fox
and a extensive 'how to' on embroidering animal furs in the style of the fox in the example embroidery

Note that due to a lot of fill stitching in this pattern, it may be more suitable for stitchers with either some embroidery experience or a lot of perseverance! The stitches used in this pattern are pretty basic.

This pattern will be available as a download after your purchase. You will receive an email containing a link to the pattern you have purchased.

Not familiar with using PDF patterns? No problem! Bunny has written a 'how to' and will send it to you if you need it. PDF patterns are very easy to use really!

name: Apple Tree
description:
This is a sweet little hand embroidery pattern of my own design of a hedgehog and a bunny standing near an Apple tree. Great for girls rooms or nurseries! My favourite part of this pattern is the dandelion fluff, a joy to embroider. :)

This PDF pattern contains a detailed description of which stitches and colours I used on the embroidery you see in the photo. There are also two versions of the pattern added, the original pattern and a 'mirrored' version so you can use the transfer method you prefer.

Finished size of this embroidery is a little under 6 by 6 inch but of course you can enlarge the pattern or make it smaller to suit your needs!

name: Walking the Globe
description:
Is this a Bear walking the Globe in a Circus or is he really walking the Globe? 

This sweet, very beginner friendly, 5 page pattern includes (besides front and intro): a colour and stitch guide and 2 versions of the pattern. One regular version and a 'mirrored' or 'reversed' version for easy transferring in the way you prefer. 

This pattern will be available as a download after your purchase. You will receive an email containing a link to the pattern you have purchased.

Any questions, please contact me, I'm happy to help.

name: Pindsvin a Brave Danish Hedgehog.
description:
Pindsvin is Danish for Hedgehog. I chose this name because our little adventerous Hedgie is floating about in a (rather huge!) tea cup with an old Danish design. Looks exceptionally cute on pillowcases and cushions. Pindsvin would also be a great addition to any nursery as wall decoration.

The example embroidery of this pattern is my interpretation of the original pattern. Iâ€™ve chosen to use a combination of fill stitches and outline stitches. There is info on colours and stitches used, included with this pattern. 

Finished size is about 4 by 4 inches. But you can also adjust the size of the pattern to suit your own needs. Whatever you do, you will have a lovely Pindsvin embroidery in the end!

With your pattern you will receive the original version and a mirrored version of the pattern for easy transferring. I've also written a few stitch suggestions for this pattern.

This pattern will be available as a download after your purchase. You will receive an email containing a link to the pattern you have purchased.

name: Bear and Fish includes extra 'key' pattern
description:
This Bear and Fish hand embroidery PDF pattern is inspired by a holiday on the seaside in France. I'd like to think that this bear is a light house keeper on an island off the coast of France. And are those fish bones on either side of him or just some ghostly fern. Who knows?

Adorable as wall art, on a pillowcase or bag. And the size is perfect for quilt blocks too!

This is a 7 page pattern and it includes:
- Front with embroidered example of the pattern
- Intro and Stitch and Colourguide (3 pg)
- 1 'normal' Bear & Fish pattern
- 1 reversed version of the Bear & Fish pattern
- 1 page with two little 'shell'key patterns (1 normal, 1 reversed)

Bear & Fish are about 4.5 by 4.5 inch (including the seaweed etc)

This pattern will be available as a download after your purchase. You will receive an email containing a link to the pattern you have purchased.

Print, transfer and stitch! I have a 'how to' PDF on transferring available for customers.

name: Most Fabulous Package Deal
description:
Three of my most popular PDF embroidery patterns in one fabulous Package Deal!

- Princess and the Pea
- Pindsvin the Brave Danish Hedgehog
- Forty Winks Fox

Check individual pattern descriptions for details. All three patterns have stitch and colour guides. A very detailed one for the Princess and the Pea and an awesome 'how to' on embroidering Animal furs in the 'Forty Winks Fox' pattern!

After payment you will receive an email with a link, so you can immediately download the patterns!
